authorName.value: United States Department of Justice. Office of Justice Programs. Bureau of Justice Statistics

authorAffiliation.value: United States Department of Justice. Office of Justice Programs. Bureau of Justice Statistics

dsDescriptionValue.value: This census provides information on county and municipal   jails facilities in the United States and their administration. For  all jails, the data   include number of prisoners and their reason for being held, age and   sex of prisoners, maximum sentence that could be served in the   facility, facility capacity and age, types of security available, and   operating expenditures. For jails in counties and municipalities with  populations of 25,000 or more, data are supplied on quarterly jail   population, age of cells, and availability of service facilities and  programs for inmates.

topicClassValue.value: ICPSR XVII.E. Social Institutions and Behavior, Crime and the Criminal Justice System

value: All locally administered county and municipal jails in  the United States with  authority to hold prisoners for more than 48 hours.
